Summary: Very bright object hovered for aprox 2hours,smaller lights lower than main light. Initially I thought it was a helicopter light as I see them often in that direction (nearby hospital transports patients). Yet it cought my attention as it did not move.
trends: There have been 96 other sightings in Wilmington
There was one other sighting in Wilmington on or around November 20th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my kitchen window and noticed a light in the southwestern sky. It was about the same elevation and path where helicopters often fly patients to and from local trauma hospital. I was looking for the chopper and it was then I noted the light was stationary. Much too bright for star. I continued to watch for movement and none noted. I went outside with binoculars and all I could see was very bright light, no sound. Did not seem to waver in position. I briefly saw a smaller and possibly 2 light objects below the larger light. I say perhaps as I convinced myself these were a reflection??when I first noticed the light it was about 6 pm, it is now 7 pm and the light is dimmer an lower in the trees. A helicopter just went by and those lights were as big and bright as the original brightness. I can no longer see the light. It is 7:11 pm
